name: Mastermind (Tomás Bruckner Kambo)
description:
DISCLAIMER

I don't own the Mastermind rights or the music. I made this game just for educational purposes (it was a test for a job!) and not for comercial use (all types of payments are disabled).

DESCRIPTION

Replica of the classic board game "Mastermind" by Mordecai Meirowitz. Made with Unity 5.3, GIMP 2.0 and Audacity.

Overall work time: 4 days.

HOW TO PLAY

See the whole rules here.

If you like the game visuals check out the artist portafolio!
